# lids-switch



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                                 | Type      | Default |
| --------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `checked` | `checked` | Specify the element should be pre-selected. | `boolean` | `false` |
| `rounded` | `rounded` | Define the shape of the toggle switch.      | `boolean` | `false` |


## Events

| Event      | Description                                                    | Type                                 |
| ---------- | -------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------ |
| `onchange` | Custom event dispatching the value of the input on submission. | `CustomEvent<{ checked: boolean; }>` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                   | Description                             |
| ---------------------- | --------------------------------------- |
| `--lids-switch-height` | Define the height of the toggle switch. |
| `--lids-switch-width`  | Define the width of the toggle switch.  |
